Title: Requires the establishment of health and safety guidelines for cats living in retail food stores
Summary: Requires the establishment of health and safety guidelines for cats living in retail food stores to ensure the humane treatment of such cats while adhering to relevant health code provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง381-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing the health and safety guidelines for cats living in retail food stores
